task.title: Adding a Dictionary and Term Lists for the Hunspell Checker

context.p: To add a new spelling dictionary to or to replace an existing one follow these steps:

step.cmd: Download the files you need for your language dictionary.
The downloaded .oxt file is a zip archive. Copy the .aff and .dic files from this archive in the spell subfolder of the preferences folder, if you are creating a new dictionary.
Copy the .aff and .dic files into the folder [Oxygen-install-folder]/dicts if you are updating an existing dictionary.
Restart the application after copying the dictionary files.

itemgroup.note: You can setup to use dictionaries and term lists from a custom location configured in the Dictionaries preferences page.
